headline: GE HealthCare BARDA Expansion Highlights AI Ultrasound And Valuation Opportunity
summary: GE HealthCare Technologies (NasdaqGS:GEHC) expanded its federal contract with BARDA to advance AI-powered ultrasound solutions for trauma care. The agreement focuses on emergency preparedness and use in field-based and mass casualty settings. The project aims to support faster, more reliable diagnostic decisions, including by clinicians with limited ultrasound experience. GE HealthCare Technologies operates across imaging, patient monitoring, and digital health tools, and this BARDA...

headline: GE HealthCare achieves MRI portfolio milestone with FDA clearances for next-generation SIGNA MRI technology designed to enhance precision imaging and clinical efficiency
summary: CHICAGO, February 19, 2026--GE HealthCare (Nasdaq: GEHC) announced today 510(k) clearance of three new magnetic resonance (MR) innovations with the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA): SIGNA™ Sprint with Freelium™1, a 1.5T sealed magnet MRI system; SIGNA™ Bolt2, an advanced 3T MRI scanner; and SIGNA™ One3, an AI-driven ecosystem of workflow solutions designed to help reduce inefficiencies and support MRI exams from plan to scan and beyond.

content.title: GE HealthCare achieves MRI portfolio milestone with FDA clearances for next-generation SIGNA MRI technology designed to enhance precision imaging and clinical efficiency
